column1: Local Foods////Bahn mi: OMG. The bahn mi was the size of a mini-watermelon!! That thing was huge. Although the meat that they used tasted exceptionally good
column2: and topped it off with incredible amount of veggies
column3: I just couldn't finish it. My jaws were worn out from biting my teeth into the rock hard bread and my jaws came out of socket the minute I was done..
